title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Combine pasta with pancetta, then mix in egg mixture off heat.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through.
Sauté onions in butter, then add tomato puree and spices.
Stir in cream and simmer until sauce thickens.
Add grilled chicken pieces to the sauce and cook for 5 more minutes.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with smashed avocado, olive oil, lemon juice, and salt.
ingredients: Optional toppings: chili flakes, poached egg, feta
instructions: Toast the bread until golden brown.
Mash avocado in a bowl with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread mashed avocado evenly on the toasted bread.
Add optional toppings like chili flakes, poached egg, or crumbled feta.
